sentences.en: a bat can detect a moth at a range of less than 8 feet.
sentences.cn: 蝙蝠能察觉八英尺之内的飞蛾。

sentences.en: a land of high mountain ranges and deep valleys
sentences.cn: 一片有高山深谷的土地

sentences.en: a range of services
sentences.cn: 一系列服务

sentences.en: a temperature range of 72-85˚
sentences.cn: 72 度到85度之间的温度范围

sentences.en: A wide range of colours and patterns are available.
sentences.cn: 各种颜色和样式都有。

sentences.en: Cars are driven through the mess, splashing everyone in range.
sentences.cn: 车从脏水里驶过，溅了周围所有人一身水。

sentences.en: Eisenhower was intensely aware of the need for long-range planning.
sentences.cn: 艾森豪威尔深谙长远规划的必要性。

sentences.en: Even the cheapest property was out of our price range (= too expensive for us ) .
sentences.cn: 即使是最便宜的房子也超出了我们能承受的价格范围。

sentences.en: His water-colour designs adorn a wide range of books.
sentences.cn: 他的水彩设计使许多图书大为生色。

sentences.en: In the dining room, team photographs were ranged along the wall.
sentences.cn: 餐厅里，球队的照片排列在墙上。

sentences.en: Our range of herbal teas contain no preservatives, colourings or artificial flavourings.
sentences.cn: 我们这一系列的药草茶不含防腐剂、色素以及人工调味品。

sentences.en: Prices range from $119 to $199, depending on the particular configuration.
sentences.cn: 价格因具体配置而异，从119美元至199美元不等。

sentences.en: Suppliers add computer consumables, office equipment and furniture to their product range.
sentences.cn: 供货商在其产品范围中增加了计算机耗材、办公设备和家具。

sentences.en: The caterpillars feed on a wide range of trees, shrubs and plants.
sentences.cn: 毛虫以各类树木、灌木和植物为食。

sentences.en: The company manufactures a range of innovative light-weight cycles.
sentences.cn: 这家公司生产一系列的新型轻便自行车。

sentences.en: The larger firm was capable of providing a better range of services.
sentences.cn: 较大的公司能够提供一系列更好的服务。

sentences.en: The shooting-range is lit from underneath by rows of ruby-red light fittings.
sentences.cn: 射击场被一排排深红色的灯光设备从下面照亮了.

sentences.en: The shop is devoted to a new range of accessories.
sentences.cn: 该商店专营新的一系列配件。

sentences.en: Their range of leisurewear is aimed at fashion-conscious 13 to 25 year-olds.
sentences.cn: 他们的休闲服系列瞄准的是追求时髦的13到25岁青少年。

sentences.en: There were 120 students whose ages ranged from 10 to 18.
sentences.cn: 有120名学生，年龄在10至18岁之间。

sentences.en: They range in price from $3 to $15.
sentences.cn: 它们的价格在$3到$15之间变化。

sentences.en: They talked amiably and easily about a range of topics.
sentences.cn: 他们友好而随意地谈论各种话题。

sentences.en: We are selling the full range of World Cup merchandising.
sentences.cn: 我们出售世界杯的所有纪念商品。

words.tran_cn: 又高又瘦的；适于远行的；宽广的
突击队员；漫游者；骑警；别动队员
平行，列为一行；延伸；漫游；射程达到
漫游；放牧；使并列；归类于；来回走动

phrases.tran_cn: 大范围的；许多各种不同的
全音域，全频；全距；全馏程
产品范围；产品系列；产品类别

trans.tran_cn: 一系列，区间，范围，射程，射击场，类，种，山脉，牧区，炉灶，音域
trans.tran_en: the limits within which amounts, quantities, ages etc vary

trans.tran_cn: 变化，变动，包括…之间的各类事物，排列，漫步，徘徊
trans.tran_en: to move around in an area without aiming for a particular place

trans.tran_cn: 变动，变化；论及，涉及；漫游，来回行动，四处搜索
trans.tran_en: to move around in an area without aiming for a particular place

trans.tran_cn: 使排列成行； 把…分类
trans.tran_en: to put things in a particular order or position
to put things in a particular order or position
